name: @deskpro-apps/wrike
title: Wrike
description: Connect your Wrike items to tickets in Deskpro to make them easy to view and update

instance_url.title: Host
instance_url.description: Enter the "Host" value (e.g., https://app-eu.wrike.com or your appropriate instance). Or leave the field blank to default to https://www.wrike.com

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: You can get the Access Token by following the Setup guide

add_comment_when_linking.title: Leave a comment on the task in Wrike when it is linked to a ticket in Deskpro

default_comment_on_ticket_reply.title: Ticket reply as comment
default_comment_on_ticket_reply.description: Enable option to add Deskpro replies as task notes when a Wrike task is linked to a Deskpro ticket

default_comment_on_ticket_note.title: Ticket note as comment
default_comment_on_ticket_note.description: Enable option to add Deskpro notes as task comments when a Wrike task is linked to a Deskpro ticket
